Articles.Content: Does anyone have a forum join date before me lol

![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

That's some serious lurking... 

Well, I don't. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I also wonder why i didnt lose my account from the forum attack

Well, I'm pretty close... and HarvesteR (of course) will have one earlier than you.

As to the forum meltdown, a few months' worth of data was lost, but not all of it. My account remained (minus several hundred posts), as did many others.
Ah ok but anyway i just watched intersteller and it was awesome

I'd hate to disappoint you, but if you go to community/memberlist then advanced search and use the sort mode 'By Join Date' you'd see how many people got here earlier than you :

![0cY9tLz.png](http://i.imgur.com/0cY9tLz.png)

way to ruin the fun jk

i really did this to see how many people joined before me that are still active

You are active? Rep for you. Congratulations. You stayed active from the month it all started to today. WHAT????

![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Pretty sure I'm one of the oldest non-dev people still here. Member 348, you're 1,764.
I am DEFINITLY not old enough to be before you! Only joined toward the end of 2014...I think
Only 9 days after you, July 23 of '11. (man, that doesn't have the same ring as " '9X")

Having a quick look through the memberlist, the oldest active non-mod member is [Kickasskyle](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/250-Kickasskyle), (of the Kyle and Winston mod); member 250, joined July 9.
Yes, but not on this forum.

Wow so there are a few older people like me 

Also the only reason my post count is low is I like to take breaks

> 
> Wow so there are a few older people like me 
> Also the only reason my post count is low is I like to take breaks

4 year long breaks ? ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) Joking!
